summary: REQ-1/2/3 appear implemented via Header, Home page, and Creator Zone card styling refinements, plus global design-system/tailwind polish. REQ-4 is partially satisfied by updating deployment verification documentation and adding a redeploy script, but an actual deployed build cannot be confirmed from the diff summary alone. The diff summary also indicates several authentication/routing/admin-related changes that were not requested and conflict with the stated non-goals/constraints.
